an4.176:1.1: “Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evam samma ayacamano ayaceyya:
an4.176:1.3: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savakanam bhikkhunam, yadidam sariputtamoggallana.
an4.176:2.1: Saddha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuni evam samma ayacamana ayaceyya:
an4.176:2.2: ‘tadisa homi yadisa khema ca bhikkhuni uppalavanna ca’ti.
an4.176:2.3: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savikanam bhikkhuninam, yadidam khema ca bhikkhuni uppalavanna ca.
an4.176:3.1: Saddho, bhikkhave, upasako evam samma ayacamano ayaceyya:
an4.176:3.2: ‘tadiso homi yadiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca alavako’ti.
an4.176:3.3: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savakanam upasakanam, yadidam citto ca gahapati hatthako ca alavako.
an4.176:4.1: Saddha, bhikkhave, upasika evam samma ayacamana ayaceyya:
an4.176:4.2: ‘tadisa homi yadisa khujjuttara ca upasika velukandakiya ca nandamata’ti.
an4.176:4.3: Esa, bhikkhave, tula etam pamanam mama savikanam upasikanam, yadidam khujjuttara ca upasika velukandakiya ca nandamata”ti.
